text: Doggy Day School was an animated, educational children's television series that ran from 2009 to 2011 in Brazil and Canada. In Brazil, it was produced by the animation studio Mixer in association with Nickelodeon. In Canada, it was produced by Cine-Aqunte in association with TVOKids (a children's programming brand based in Ontario), the Knowledge Kids TV channel, Radio-Canada Television, and Saskatchewan Communications Network. Category:2010 Canadian television series debuts Category:Canadian animated television series
title: Doggy Day School
